com.ericsson.oss.itpf.datalayer.dps.migrate

Interface DbMigrationController


  • public interface DbMigrationController
    Provides support for database migration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clientReady(java.lang.String migrationName, java.lang.String clientHostName)
      Indication that this client is ready to start using newly migrated data.
      MigrationStatus getMigrationStatus(java.lang.String migrationName)
      Get the status of the migration.
      MigrationStatus startMigration(java.lang.String migrationName, java.lang.String clientHostName, int numberOfClients)
      Indicate that the client controller is ready to start migration.

    • Method Detail

      • startMigration

        MigrationStatus startMigration(java.lang.String migrationName,
                               java.lang.String clientHostName,
                               int numberOfClients)
        Indicate that the client controller is ready to start migration. Will return an indication that the migration is already completed.
        Parameters:
        migrationName - the name of the migration.
        clientHostName - the unique identifier for the client requesting the migration to start.
        numberOfClients - the number of application clients in the current deployment which are affected by this migration.
        Returns:
        the status of the migration.

      • getMigrationStatus

        MigrationStatus getMigrationStatus(java.lang.String migrationName)
        Get the status of the migration.
        Parameters:
        migrationName - the name of the migration.
        Returns:
        the status of the migration.

      • clientReady

        void clientReady(java.lang.String migrationName,
                 java.lang.String clientHostName)
        Indication that this client is ready to start using newly migrated data.
        Parameters:
        migrationName - the name of the migration.
        clientHostName - the unique identifier for the client.
